duration_in_months: But to make it easier to read, I suggest you create a JSON output that only includes the fields that matter. Please find my reformatted data below. Then, I can provide you with the JSON format.
full_summary:
**Automatic Identification Technology (AIT) Project Material Management (MM) Stream**
======================

**Document Information**
------------------------

* **Title**: Automatic Identification Technology (AIT) Project Material Management (MM) Stream, W6381-180019.C
* **Document Type**: Request for Information (RFI)
* **Publication Date**: March 25, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 10, 2024 at 02:00 PM EDT
* **Reference Number**: WS3383645811-Doc4505890742
* **Amendment Number**: 2

**Procurement Information**
---------------------------

* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Includes eligibility for various trade agreements, including ALENA, CFTA, and CPTPP.

**Scope**
----------

The Automatic Identification Technology (AIT) Project Material Management (MM) Stream seeks to gather information from potential vendors regarding Automatic Identification (ID) technologies to optimize material management processes. This is a Request for Information (RFI) issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Requirements and Selection Criteria**
--------------------------------------

Vendors shall demonstrate their ability to provide solutions for:

* Handheld PDA Starter Kits
* Bar code reader equipment
* Scanners
* Bar code printer
* Radio frequency identification RFID tag printer
* Radio frequency scanners
* Systems integration design
* Application implementation services

The selection criteria for this procurement will be based on a combination of Technical Merit and Price.

**Instructions for Response**
---------------------------

All interested vendors must respond to this RFI by no later than April 10, 2024, at 02:00 PM EDT. Responses will be accepted via email to the point of contact listed below.

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

For any questions or clarifications, please contact:

Vanessa Cairney
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

Email: [vanessa.cairney@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:vanessa.cairney@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Key Locations**
----------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entities: Department of National Defence (DND)NOTE
Ownership Note: The contractor shared the original doc in English and French language unfortunately that shared text
